projects.title: Portfolio Website
description: Serves as a little archive of what I'm up to.

projects.title: VR A-Frame Explorer
description: Project focused on both exploring the generation of photo-realistic 3D models based on real places, and on the development of a platform to explore these models on.

projects.title: Arch Quick Setup
description: Some scripts and files to make setting up my OS on a fresh install just the way I like it.
Just clone the repo and run the script, and you'll have my workstation up and running.

projects.title: Atlas of Anatomical Pathology
description: An online Atlas of Anatomical Pathology.
An educative tool made for a Veterinary Medicine University teacher.
